channel.title: Your Opinions on the Forums!
channel.description:
# Hello Throners!
I've started using more features that we have access to on the Forums, like, Banner Topics. You'll have occasionally seen the Banners on the top of your Forum Page! I would like to know if you would like to see more of these for big announcements such as Patch Notes or Dev Updates etc!
Here is a screenshot of how the Banner Pin will look:
https://i.robflop.me/jl4D7A3P.png
# Do you like this feature?
[poll type=regular] * Yes * No * Other (Leave Feedback) [/poll]
# If this feature was to keep being used, how often would you like it to be used?
[poll name=poll2 type=regular] * Most Announcements (Events, Patches, Dev-blogs, Promotions) * Important stuff (Patch Notes, Dev-blogs) * Just Patch Notes [/poll]
